author: markt
msg: - Disable scanning for a free port in Jk AJP/1.3 connector by default.
- Do not change maxPort field value of ChannelSocket in its #setPort()
- Add support for "maxPort" attribute on a <Connector> element as a synonym

msg: Added a test to check that the AP addition only accept valid APs (ie, IAP under AAP or SAP/IAP with the same role)
